hadiths.text: Abu Huraira (Allah be pleased with him) reported Allah's Mess-., nger (ﷺ) as saying:Gold is to be paid for by gold with equal weight, like for like, and silver is to be paid for by silver with equal weight, like for like. He who made an addition to it or demanded an addition dealt in usury

chapter.ara-name: باب الصَّرْفِ وَبَيْعِ الذَّهَبِ بِالْوَرِقِ نَقْدًا
chapter.eng-name: Exchange and Selling Gold for Silver on the spot
